SEARCH
Package Model

Class StudentList

java.lang.Object
Model.StudentList
public class StudentList extends Object
The StudentList class manages a list of students and provides methods to add, remove, and find students. It also allows saving and loading student data, including their grades, from a file.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Adrian Reszka

  • Field Details

    • students

      private ArrayList<Student> students
      A list of all students in the system. It is initialized as an empty list and is filled with student objects when students are added.

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentList

      public StudentList()

  • Method Details

    • getStudents

      public ArrayList<Student> getStudents()
      Method used to get current list of students
      Returns:
      latest list of students

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent(int id, String name, String surname) throws StudentAlreadyExistsException
      Adds a new student to the list.
      Parameters:
      id - the student's ID
      name - the student's name
      surname - the student's surname
      Throws:
      StudentAlreadyExistsException - if the student with specified id exists

    • removeStudent

      public void removeStudent(int id) throws StudentNotFoundException
      Removes a student from the list based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the student's ID
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - if student with specified id was not found

    • editStudentData

      public void editStudentData(int studentId, String newName, String newSurname) throws StudentNotFoundException
      Edits the data of a specific student identified by ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student to be edited
      newName - the new name for the student
      newSurname - the new surname for the student
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - if the student with specified id was not found

    • addGradeToStudent

      public void addGradeToStudent(int studentId, String gradeInput, String teacher, String subject) throws InvalidGradeIndexException, StudentNotFoundException, InvalidGradeFormatException
      Adds a grade to a specific student identified by ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student
      gradeInput - the grade input string
      teacher - the name of the teacher assigning the grade
      subject - the subject for which the grade is given
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - if the student with specified id was not found
      InvalidGradeIndexException - if the grade with specified index was not found
      InvalidGradeFormatException - if the grade format is incorrect

    • removeGradeFromStudent

      public void removeGradeFromStudent(int studentId, int gradeIndex) throws StudentNotFoundException, InvalidGradeIndexException
      Removes a grade from a student identified by ID and grade index.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student
      gradeIndex - the index of the grade to be removed
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - if the student with specified id was not found
      InvalidGradeIndexException - if the grade with specified index was not found

    • editStudentGrade

      public void editStudentGrade(int studentId, int gradeIndex, double newGradeValue, String newTeacher, String newSubject) throws StudentNotFoundException, InvalidGradeIndexException, InvalidGradeFormatException
      Edits a specific grade of a student identified by ID and grade index.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student
      gradeIndex - the index of the grade to be edited
      newGradeValue - the new grade value as a string
      newTeacher - the new teacher for the grade
      newSubject - the new subject for the grade
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - if the student with specified id was not found
      InvalidGradeIndexException - if the grade with specified index was not found
      InvalidGradeFormatException - if the grade format is incorrect

    • findStudentById

      public Student findStudentById(int id)
      Finds a student by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the student to find
      Returns:
      the Student object if found
